metadata.title: CVE-2021-23203 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper access control in reporting engine of Odoo Community 14.0 through15.0, and Odoo Enterprise 14.0 through 15.0, allows remote attackers todownload PDF reports for arbitrary documents, via crafted requests.

criterions.comment: odoo package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
